revision.text:
MediaWiki, Semantic MediaWiki and RDFIO successfully installed!
Now please follow these steps:
# First [[Special:UserLogin|log in to the wiki]] (user Admin, pass changethis). # Please go to the [[Special:RDFIOAdmin|RDFIO Admin Special Page]] and ensure that the ARC2 store is properly set up. # Go to the [[Special:RDFImport|RDF Import Special Page]], click "Paste RDF", and then "RDFXML example data" under the text field, and import it. # GO to [[Special:RecentChanges|Recent Changes]], to see if you got some newly imported data. # Finally, go to the [[Special:SPARQLEndpoint|SPARQL Endpoint]] and execute the example query, and see if you can see the example data show up!

* navigation ** mainpage|mainpage-description ** recentchanges-url|recentchanges ** randompage-url|randompage ** helppage|help * Semantic Tools ** Special:RDFIOAdmin|RDFIO Admin ** Special:RDFImport|RDF Import ** Special:SPARQLEndpoint|SPARQL Endpoint ** Special:SPARQLImport|SPARQL Import ** Special:Categories|Categories ** Special:Properties|Properties * SEARCH * TOOLBOX * LANGUAGES
